A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There's a line in the trailer ( so this is not a spoiler) where Luke says "This is not going to go the way you think."

This was a message to us\, the fans.

Throw any preconceived notions you may have right out the window before you go see this\, and view it with an open mind\, and you might just be blown away.

If not\, you may walk away angry and confused.

I can't really say more than that.
